items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: Fit perfectly. I am currently 6 months pregnant and it was very stretchy. Comfortable fit and it was the perfect style for my birthday. Read more
items.author: Bria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Fit and Well Made Dress
items.body: I wore this to a wedding and was so comfortable all night long. The dress is well made and very flattering. It has a lot of stretch and the ruffle bottom and ruching along the body make for a beautiful fit. I had purchased several dresses from different department stores for all different prices, and in the end, I chose this inexpensive dress and can’t believe how great it was for the price! 5’2” appx 130-135 I got a medium but felt less restricted in the large, so I chose that size instead. Read more
items.author: SoFlo Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute
items.body: Fits well for heavier girls, gives a nice shape and makes the mama pooch look smoothened out. Good value for money and the mesh is so soft too. Honestly was so comfortable and stretchy to wear for a night out. Zipper worked seamlessly too (5’2 150lbs.) Read more
items.author: Z

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: Need to be a little thicker to make this dress look flattering. Was too large on me. Pretty though and nice material. Very stretchy Read more
items.author: Anna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress. Fits just right
items.body: Love the dress!! Haven’t worn it yet but it seems to be a good material. It’s lightweight, not see through at all. Fits just right. The color is just how it looked online. Plan on wearing this to a wedding Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Runs small, I would order up a size or even two. Decent quality, kinda see through. Looks better in the picture. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Quality, pretty dress!
items.body: Very pretty, I might wear this to my graduation later this year. Just a little plain up top for me! Read more
items.author: Margaret

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: I loved this dress, it fit perfectly. I think a large would've been fine since it is super stretchy. Definitely recommend and also got so many compliments Read more
items.author: eduardo vargas

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched Long Sleeve Formal Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched Long Sleeve Formal Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, White, Burgundy, Black, Light Purple, Navy Blue, Dark Purple, Armygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
